name: Moo Moo Care
description:
Moo Moo Care! Entry for Ludum Dare 51 (Theme: "Every 10 Seconds")

Rate my game here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/moo-moo-care

=== Description ===

You play as Lorelei, owner of the cow daycare Moo Moo Care! Your goal is to save up enough money ($500) to finally retire from this job. It won't be easy, because the phone rings every ten seconds!

Pick up the phone to get customers, provide fast service and happy cows to get paid more!

=== Controls ===

Z/C: Answer the phone, grab a cow, drop a cow, clean up poop, build a gate, open a gate, plant grass

X/V: Answer the phone, pet a cow, build a fence, destroy a fence, destroy a gate

=== Tips ===

1) First and foremost, you don't always have to answer the phone! Sometimes it's better to make happy cows than get too many customers.

2) Plant lots of grass with Z/C, and don't forget to make pens for the cows so they don't run away!

3) Cows don't like being too crowded or being around too much poop, so be careful!
